author: cnbc.com
title: Sientra reports 4Q loss
text:
SANTA BARBARA, Calif. (AP) _ Sientra Inc. (SIEN) on Tuesday reported a loss of $17.8 million in its fourth quarter.
The Santa Barbara, California-based company said it had a loss of 92 cents per share.
The breast implant maker posted revenue of $11.1 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $64 million, or $3.34 per share. Revenue was reported as $36.5 million.
Sientra shares have declined 29 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $10.03, a rise of 4 percent in the last 12 months.
